Summary: white circle very high se sky above clouds moving in circles, behind clouds
divs: Sighting Detailsin downtown howell for farmers market. standing on county courthouse grounds, partly cloudy day with cotton ball clouds at about 5-8000 ft. high stratus clouds most likely around 20,000 ft. at 11:55am (i checked cell phone for time after i realized what i saw) i looked up checking clouds out and saw white disc traveling in circles. i first thought that seagull was extremely fast and high, then i noticed that it was disc, and it went behind stratus "mares tails" and then back into blue sky at least three times, then flew away or i lost it. total time of sighting was 12-20 seconds. looked for another 10 mins but did not find it. reminded me of you-tube video of "mothership" from london, but higher. thought all night whether i should make report, but i did see what i report. it was not bird, i saw birds and they were noticeably lower and darker, this almost "glowed" white.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Howell
There were no other sightings in Howell on or around July 3rd 2011
